content: रुच् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (रोचते, रुरुवे, अरुचत्-अरोचिष्ट, रोचिष्यते, रुचित) {@--1@} To shine, look splendid or beautiful, be resplendent; रुरुचिरे रुचिरेक्षणविभ्रमाः <ls>Śi. 6. 46</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 62.</ls> {@--2@} To like, be pleased with (said of persons), be agreeable to, please (of things); used with <ab>dat.</ab> of the person who is pleased and <ab>nom.</ab> of the thing; न स्रजा रुरुचिरे रमणीभ्यः <ls>Ki. 9. 35</ls>; यदेव रोचते यस्मै भवेत्तत्तस्य सुंदरं <ls>H. 2. 53</ls>; sometimes with <ab>gen.</ab> of person; दारिद्र्यान्मरणाद्वा मरणं मम रोचते न दारिद्र्यं <ls>Mk. 1. 11.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (रोचयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to like, make pleasant or agreeable; <ls>Ku. 3. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To illuminate, irradiate. {@--3@} To like, find pleasure in {@--4@} To resolve. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (रुरु-रो-चिषते) To wish to like &c.

रुच्, रुचा {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [रुच्-क्विप् वा टाप्] {@--1@} Light, lustre, brightness; क्षणदासु यत्र च रुचं कतां गताः <ls>Śi. 13. 53</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">9. 23</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 9.">25</ls>; शिखरमणिरुचः <ls>Ki. 5. 43</ls>; <ls>Me. 44.</ls> {@--2@} Splendour, loveliness, beauty. {@--3@} Colour, appearance (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); चलवन्भृंगरुचस्तवालकान् <ls>R. 8. 53</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 65</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 16</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 45.</ls> {@--4@} Liking, desire. {@--5@} Lightning. {@--6@} The note of the parrot or Mainā.
